page.title: 18SCHOOL SPORTS DAY.
page.content: Every year in July the school has its Sports Day to which parents are invited. Heats are run off before the day itself so that it is the finals that are held on sports day. There are several different kinds of events; running races, egg & spoon, potato race, sack race, relay race, and a three legged race. There is also a cricket ball throwing competition. The children are divided into four groups 'Blue' 'Green' 'Red' and 'Yellow' and points are awarded for the first three places in the races. The winning team is the one who has the most points after the races have been run. A cup is presented to the captain of the winning team and a ribbon of the team colour is threaded through it. The winning team usually run a lap of honour.
